messages.subject: ren's post of putting kidds off
messages.msgSnippet: Ren s post really spoke to me How many times did my kid ask me for something and I just forget about it because I don t think it is that great of an idea but
messages.messageBody:
Ren's post really spoke to me How many times did my kid ask me for
something and I just forget about it because I don't think it is that
great of an idea but when they find someone else who is willing to do
that thing with them (half-witted as I see it). That make a bond with
that other person and is an opprotunity that *I* missed out on.
Missed out on biulding a bond, on hanging out, on bringing some joy to
someone else, and maybe some fun for me, all because it didn't
*seem* like a good idea when first pitched to me.
How many time have you been out with friends doing "nothing much " but
made lots of fun memories???

Oh I will be thinking of this post for a while and hopefully be able
to fain enough interest in something to get me out and doing.

Try it you might like it my mom was right! thanks Ren

jean
